ygData.subject: Scam Alert
ygData.msgSnippet: There s a new scam out there targetting users of Yahoo who have Everquest listed on their profiles as an interest. If you get an email like the following,
ygData.messageBody:
There's a new scam out there targetting users of
Yahoo who have Everquest listed on their profiles as an
interest. If you get an email like the following, forward
it with full headers to the Fraud and Abuse
department of Yahoo, Verant, and whatever email company the
person sending it used.<br>QUOTE:<br>Congradulations
inhabitants of Norrath!<br><br>You've just won a 100% free
Everquest Expansion Pre-Order for the "Shadows <br>of
Luclin" when it is available late this
December!!<br><br>These were random pickings of 500 lucky winners to show
Verant and the<br>Everquest Team's appreciation toward
our players!<br><br>This Expansion is 100% free and
will be mailed to the address given when you
<br>registered your Everquest account. If this address has
changed, please email <br>us your new address to insure
the winnings are send to the
correct<br>address.<br><br>Please email us back insuring you've recieved this email
and DO want your <br>100% free "SoL"
Expansion.<br><br>Along with your acceptance email, please include the
following to verify the <br>account belongs to you, as we
do not send Expansions to players whos <br>accounts
have not been randomly drawn as a winner.<br>1)
Station Name<br>2) Station Password<br>3) New address (if
changed since account was registered> )<br>4) CD-KEY
(Not required but helps to determine true
ownership)<br>Thank you and good adventuring in the world of
Norrath!<br><br>Please feel free to send us any questions you
have.<br>All Expansions are expected to be Shipped at YOUR
house no later than <br>December 15 if you respond to
our email prompt!<br><br><br>Thanks, John
Edwards.<br>Head of Customer Service - Branch 12E EVERQUEST
-<br>Verant Interactive - Sony.
